user.title: Denon AVR Network Receivers
user.description: Connect to your receiver, if the IP adress is not set, auto-discovery is used

select.title: Select the receiver that you wish to connect
select.description: Run the setup again if you want to connect aditional receivers

error.discovery_error: Failed to discover a Denon AVR Network Receiver

abort.already_configured: Device is already configured, possibly check the 'Show ignored integrations' in the top right

abort.connection_error: Failed to connect, please try again
abort.not_denonavr_manufacturer: Not a Denon AVR Network Receiver, discovered manafucturer did not match
abort.not_denonavr_missing: Not a Denon AVR Network Receiver, discovery information not complete
